entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
